alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower Vermilion; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 4:10PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN IBERIA... SOUTHEASTERN LAFAYETTE...EAST CENTRAL VERMILION AND WEST CENTRAL ST. MARTIN PARISHES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 410 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coteau, or 8 miles west of New Iberia, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, St. Martinville, Avery Island, Broussard, Youngsville, Erath, Delcambre, Cade, Lydia, Acadiana Regional Airport, Jefferson Island, Coteau, and Henry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower Vermilion; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper Vermilion
